text: Salim Al-Huss (Arabic: سليم أحمد الحص; 20 December 1929 - 25 August 2024) was a Lebanese politician. He was a Prime Minister of Lebanon and a longtime Member of Parliament representing his hometown, Beirut. Hoss died on 25 August 2024 in Beirut at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Presidents of Lebanon Category:Prime ministers of Lebanon Category:Lebanese writers
title: Salim Al-Huss
